snippet.title: Roller Drama Official Trailer - Performance Is A Mindset!
snippet.description:
In Roller Drama you play a visual novel / sport management mashup videogame: lead a team of Roller Derby athletes using strategy and real-time controls. Outside the ring you’ll have to manage five big personalities as they grapple with friendship, heartbreak, and late capitalist society in a sort of sit-com... 

Roller Drama will be released in (very) early 2023 on Steam (great on Steam Deck!), Switch, iOS, Android, & Playstation, in English, Italian, French, German, Portuguese, Chinese, and Japanese. 

This is an indie game, 100% self-published. Sharing & adding Roller Drama to your Steam wishlist here https://store.steampowered.com/app/1293420/Roller_Drama/ would make us & those five skaters very happy: thank you all! ❤️ 

Hope you liked our trailer!

Roller Drama is produced by Open Lab — https://open-lab.com/ 
Team: 

Concept, production, game design, game writing, coding: Pietro "Punkard" Polsinelli @ppolsinelli

Artistic direction, graphic, animation, and audio design & programming: Giuseppe "Pino" Panzarella @pugusel 

Character design: Vittoria "Vic" Macioci @Vic_Cricket_Mac

Story and game writing: Verena Kyratzes @VerenaKyratzes 

Music: Francesco Arcuri

Open Lab management & testing: Matteo Bicocchi @pupunzi, Laura Mirri 

Main external tester: Daniele Ulivi @UliviDaniele

Italian localization: Matteo Pozzi @wearemuesli, other localizations: RiotLoc studio.

Marketing help: Future Friends @FutureFriendsVG
